name: Item No Price 2025
query:
SELECT
            item.name as item_code,
            item.item_name,
            item.item_group
        FROM
            `tabItem` as item
        WHERE
            item.disabled = 0 -- Exclude template items
            AND item.item_group IN ('Product', 'Valve Head', 'Syringe')
            AND NOT EXISTS (
                SELECT
                    1 -- Use 1 for existence check, it's more efficient
                FROM
                    `tabItem Price` as item_price
                WHERE
                    item_price.item_code = item.name
                    AND item_price.price_list LIKE "%%2025%%"
            )
        ORDER BY
            item.item_group, item.item_name
